channel.title: Posts on Ess Gee Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ess Gee Labs

item.title: Build a Check Point Firewall Lab
item.description: Check Point is the most mature firewall in the industry. Here we install the firewall and management in a lab environment that you can use for testing or training.

item.title: Virtual Machines in Proxmox
item.description: Now that Proxmox and the virtual networks are setup, we can spin up some virtual instances.

item.title: Virtual Networking Within Proxmox
item.description: In the last post I gave a brief overview of Proxmox, now we discuss creating virtual networks to allow VMs to communicate.

item.title: Home Lab With Proxmox
item.description: A virtualisation server goes a long way when building your home lab. Consider Proxmox for your project.

item.title: Network Switching Tips
item.description: In my experience I’ve noticed several things that many people don’t know about switches so I thought it wise to document some. I’ll be updating this when new things come to mind.

item.title: Git Unsafe Repository
item.description: What to do when you get the error “fatal: unsafe repository (<repo directory is owned by someone else)”

item.title: Building a blog with Hugo
item.description: This is the first time I’m using Hugo so I made a little tutorial to help others.

item.title: Using Git with cPanel to update your website
item.description: Configuing cPanel Git Versioning for Web Site deployment

item.title: First Post
item.description: I’ve been meaning to put up a technical website like this for a really long time. Time to make things happen.
